ygData.subject: Re: JBoots (the ever popular)
ygData.msgSnippet: Jboots are still of Drelzna in Najena. As for level you need to be with relatively 3 level 28+ casters to attempt the jboots. It s also a good idea to summon
ygData.messageBody:
Jboots are still of Drelzna in Najena. As for level you need to be with
relatively 3 level 28+ casters to attempt the jboots. It's also a good idea
to summon pets as Drelzna's Harm Touch can do some serious damage. Also you
can still get the Oracle robe off the oracle by killing him. I also am
pretty sure the quest is not working right now, I think anyway. Not to
mention that you need to be high level to attempt the quest like at lreast
35+ or have some help.

Actually us casters don't get a equivilent in armor. I'm currently level 35
and I just now got my FBR. Getting hit for damage just gets worse as you
level. At my level the dungeon I go to if a mob goes aggro on me I'm
basically dead unless somebody immediatly casts a Area Effect spell.
Otherwise I'm dead in 10 seconds or so.


-----Original Message-----
From: Shadow Panther <shdwpanther@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, August 19, 1999 6:10 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] JBoots (the ever popular)


>From: "Shadow Panther" <shdwpanther@...>
>
>Greets,
>
> I am curious if they've changed how you get Journyman Boots such as they
>changed the Oracle Robe to a quest (speaking of which, does he attack DE
>Necros?)?
>
> Also, if so how do I get started?
> And if not, what dungeon is she in & where's it located? I need to
know
>a level recommendation for the area & her, as well. It's been awhile since
>I've heard much about them.
>
> On a seperate subject. I'm 14th level and still wearing the Sr.
>Apprentice robe. The rest of my armour, which isn't much at that, are only
>cloth items. Greens can hit for 15, 20pts of damage, it's pretty sad. I
>know casters don't get much, but I know we get better than this. Could you
>give robe & armour idea, where one may find them, level VS item (such as
>25th being typical for full Bronze), etc? I'm half naked, and I'm supposed
>to be a scary Necromancer. LoL Nothing all too impressive about this. :-)
>
> Thanks for the help. I don't focus on leveling much, obviously, but
I'd
>enjoy some new stuff. Finally, at 13th level, I got my Runed Totem Staff
>(for a higher price than I could've I later learned, but oh well).
>
> Thanks folks.
>
> Currently, I'm in the Qeynos area, but semi-soon heading back towards
>Neriak. Anything in these two areas would be nice to hear about. I know
>the Flowing Black Robe is in Najena in Lavastorm, but at my level I'm
pretty
>sure this is a weeeee above me. ;-) However, I would still like it.
>
> Thanks for any info folks. :-)
>
>~Shadow
